trans-unit.target: 选择一项～

trans-unit.source: • Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: •目标生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: • Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: •消灭目标防御力等于或大于4的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Every choice alters the path of fate."\n—Sarkhan Vol
trans-unit.target: 「每个选择都会影响命途走向。」 ～萨坎沃

trans-unit.source: Wrath of God
trans-unit.target: 神之愤怒

trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.source: Apprentice Wizard
trans-unit.target: 魔术师学徒

trans-unit.source: Aspiring wizards must demonstrate basic levels of willpower and mental discipline to even be considered for an apprenticeship.
trans-unit.target: 立志咒艺者必先展现出基本的意志力和精神自制力，才有资格成为学徒。

trans-unit.source: Arcum Dagsson
trans-unit.target: 阿肯达格森

trans-unit.source: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search their library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.
trans-unit.target: {T}：目标神器生物的操控者将它牺牲。该牌手可以从其牌库中搜寻一张非生物的神器牌，将之放进战场，然后将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."
trans-unit.target: 「奇械曾撕裂这世界。此般悲剧将不再发生。」

trans-unit.source: Argivian Restoration
trans-unit.target: 阿基夫的修复术

trans-unit.source: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.source: "The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless."\n—Hanna, *Weatherlight* navigator
trans-unit.target: 「阿基夫的大学教了我两件事：其一是要时时回顾过去，其二是切莫轻视看似无用之物。」 ～*晴空号*领航员哈娜

trans-unit.source: Braids, Conjurer Adept
trans-unit.target: 咒法专家布蕾德

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put an artifact, creature, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手可以将一张神器，生物或地牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.source: The rifted multiverse became a sea of conflicting realities, each peopled by possible versions of every living being.
trans-unit.target: 受时缝影响的多重宇宙里，现实彼此冲突，挤满了每个生灵各种可能成为的样貌。

trans-unit.source: Brainstorm
trans-unit.target: 脑力激荡

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌，然后从你手上将两张牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.
trans-unit.target: 整排的米捷球助她的心灵深探思想领域，寻访其间智慧灵光。

trans-unit.source: Cloudreader Sphinx
trans-unit.target: 识云史芬斯

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: When Cloudreader Sphinx enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 当识云史芬斯进战场时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: Corridor Monitor
trans-unit.target: 长廊监卫

trans-unit.target: 当长廊监卫进战场时，重置目标由你操控的神器或生物。

trans-unit.source: Castle Vantress has no locks on its doors, but interlopers rarely make it past the foyer.
trans-unit.target: 虽然凡翠丝堡的大门从不上锁，但鲜有擅入者见过门厅之外的模样。

trans-unit.target: 超载{6}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.source: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷以非天然灾害为业。

trans-unit.source: Deepglow Skate
trans-unit.target: 渊光鳐

trans-unit.target: 当渊光鳐进战场时，选择任意数量的目标永久物。将这些永久物上面的各种指示物数量加倍。

trans-unit.source: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.
trans-unit.target: 优雅曳动，缀海床以流光。

trans-unit.source: Esperzoa
trans-unit.target: 艾斯波佐雅

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将一个由你操控的神器移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: The more metal it digests, the more its jelly will fetch on the alchemists' market.
trans-unit.target: 它吃得越多，体内胶质在炼金术士市场上就能卖得更好。

trans-unit.source: Faerie Mechanist
trans-unit.target: 仙灵机械师

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: When Faerie Mechanist enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 当仙灵机械师进战场时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌。你可以展示其中的一张神器牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Force of Will
trans-unit.target: 意志之力

trans-unit.target: 你可以支付1点生命并从你手上放逐一张蓝色牌，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: That gnat was still hovering by the venison, and now both looked delicious.

trans-unit.source: "Do not react to force in kind. Turn it aside. Direct it to where it can do no harm."\n—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

trans-unit.target: 「第七海入其咽喉，从此世上不复见。」 ～艾斯波寓言

trans-unit.source: Her knack for tampering with wards got her kicked out of the academy, but they also got her back in.

trans-unit.source: "Today's paperweight, tomorrow's leveler."\n—Bruenna, Neurok leader
trans-unit.target: 「今日的小小纸镇，明日可能变成夷平者。」 ～纽若克统领布威娜

trans-unit.target: 纽若克人将神器师看作考古学家，厘清谬误好看见底下埋藏的事实。

trans-unit.source: Ad Nauseam
trans-unit.target: 倒胃口

trans-unit.source: Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost. You may repeat this process any number of times.
trans-unit.target: 展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。你失去等同于其总法术力费用的生命。你可以将此流程重复任意次数。

trans-unit.source: When the task spilled over into undeath, he stopped calling it his life's work.
trans-unit.target: 当任务在他死后的生涯仍需持续，他便不再称此为「终生使命」。

trans-unit.source: Beacon of Unrest
trans-unit.target: 不息信标

trans-unit.source: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器或生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。将不息信标洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.source: "The light of my master's guidance traverses all boundaries, even those separating life and death."
trans-unit.target: 「我主指引的明光遍及所有地界，即使隔绝生死的领域都能到达。」

trans-unit.source: Bone Picker
trans-unit.target: 食骨鸟

trans-unit.source: This spell costs {3} less to cast if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 如果本回合中有生物死去，则此咒语减少{3}来施放。

trans-unit.source: Flying, deathtouch
trans-unit.target: 飞行，死触

trans-unit.source: They are the first to greet dissenters on their journey into exile.
trans-unit.target: 它们是逆徒在流放路途中的首批访客。

trans-unit.source: Cast Down
trans-unit.target: 湮灭

trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonlegendary creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非传奇的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Your life is finished, your name lost, and your work forgotten. It is as though Mazeura never existed."\n—*Chainer's Torment*
trans-unit.target: 「你的生命已终结，你的名字已失佚，你的成就已湮没。仿佛马佐拉从未存在。」 ～*《崔纳的绝境》*

trans-unit.source: Costly Plunder
trans-unit.target: 昂贵劫夺

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器或生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.source: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: No lock of iron is a match for Vraska's will of stone.
trans-unit.target: 铁质锁具挡不住瓦丝卡的铁石心肠。

trans-unit.source: Dark Confidant
trans-unit.target: 黑暗亲信

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。你失去等同于其总法术力费用的生命。

trans-unit.source: Greatness, at any cost.
trans-unit.target: 追求卓越，不计代价。

trans-unit.source: Death's Shadow
trans-unit.target: 死亡阴影

trans-unit.source: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.
trans-unit.target: 死亡阴影得-X/-X，X为你的总生命。

trans-unit.source: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.
trans-unit.target: 蜡烛火光渐弱，而其阴影愈显高大。

trans-unit.source: Defiant Salvager
trans-unit.target: 无畏回收师

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice an artifact or creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Defiant Salvager. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器或生物：在无畏回收师上放置一个+1/+1指示物。只可以于你能施放法术的时机下起动此异能。

trans-unit.source: "I didn't survive that crash just so I could fall to the likes of you."
trans-unit.target: 「我在那次坠毁中幸存，可不是为了变成你们之流。」

trans-unit.source: Dire Fleet Hoarder
trans-unit.target: 焦炬舰队匿宝客

trans-unit.source: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 当焦炬舰队匿宝客死去时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.source: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.
trans-unit.target: 对于莽霸联盟的海盗而言，只有成功比失败更难熬。

trans-unit.source: Disciple of Bolas
trans-unit.target: 波拉斯信徒

trans-unit.source: When Disciple of Bolas enters the battlefield, sacrifice another creature. You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is that creature's power.
trans-unit.target: 当波拉斯信徒进战场时，牺牲另一个生物。你获得X点生命且抓X张牌，X为该生物的力量。

trans-unit.source: "Lord Bolas has shown me how each miserable little life holds untold resources."
trans-unit.target: 「波拉斯大人向我展示过低贱的生命如何掩饰秘密。」

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·86 | Disciple of the Vault | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Disciple of the Vault
trans-unit.target: 黯窖门徒

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·86 | Disciple of the Vault | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have target opponent lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个神器从战场进入坟墓场时，你可以令目标对手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·86 | Disciple of the Vault | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He stands in the shadow of his lord, Geth, drinking in the dark energies of the Vault.
trans-unit.target: 他在其主盖司的阴影庇护下，畅饮黯窖的黑暗能源。

trans-unit.source: Divest
trans-unit.target: 褫夺

trans-unit.source: Target player reveals their hand. You choose an artifact or creature card from it. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张神器或生物牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: Flittersprites collect unusually valuable things: coins of fallen empires, baby teeth, and memories of treasured names.
trans-unit.target: 迅舞仙子收集格外珍贵的东西：堕落王朝的钱币，乳齿，以及对珍贵名字的记忆。

trans-unit.source: Doomed Necromancer
trans-unit.target: 败亡死灵术士

trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Doomed Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，牺牲败亡死灵术士：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Many necromancers share the same last words—the ones that conclude the undeath ritual.
trans-unit.target: 许多死灵术士的遗言是同一句～用来结束亡物仪式的那句。

trans-unit.source: Dread Return
trans-unit.target: 颤栗再现

trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback— Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 返照～牺牲三个生物。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.
trans-unit.target: 忘却过往梦魇的人，注定倒霉要再度碰上。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·90 | Driver of the Dead | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Driver of the Dead
trans-unit.target: 亡者车夫

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·90 | Driver of the Dead | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当亡者车夫死去时，将目标总法术力费用等于或小于2的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·90 | Driver of the Dead | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.
trans-unit.target: 有些吸血鬼被护教军烧毁庄园、驱离祖传猎食地，改靠尸体交易过活。

trans-unit.source: Drown in Sorrow
trans-unit.target: 陷入悲痛

trans-unit.source: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: 所有生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.source: "The sad truth is that the whip of Erebos is long enough to wrap around all our throats."\n—Perisophia the philosopher
trans-unit.target: 「不幸的是，厄睿柏斯的鞭子长到足以勒住我们所有人的脖子。」 ～哲人珀里索菲娅

trans-unit.source: Executioner's Capsule
trans-unit.target: 刽子手坠盒

trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Executioner's Capsule: Destroy target nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，{T}，牺牲刽子手坠盒：消灭目标非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.source: There is always a moment of trepidation before opening a message capsule, for fear of the judgment that might be contained within.
trans-unit.target: 打开这坠盒之前总会不自主地颤抖，深怕其中可能承载的裁决。

trans-unit.source: Fatal Push
trans-unit.target: 送终一击

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标生物的总法术力费用等于或小于2，则消灭之。

trans-unit.source: Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
trans-unit.target: 反抗～如果本回合中有由你操控的永久物离开战场，则改为如果目标生物的总法术力费用等于或小于4，则消灭之。

trans-unit.target: 威吓（此生物只能被神器生物和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: Before the zealots of the Ethersworn came to power, Esper illusionists dreamed up creations to mimic a variety of substances.
trans-unit.target: 在乙金盟由狂热派掌权之前，艾斯波的幻影师梦想着用造物来模仿各种物质。

trans-unit.source: Heartless Pillage
trans-unit.target: 无情劫掠

trans-unit.source: Target opponent discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Raid — If you attacked this turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 突击～如果你本回合中攻击过，则派出一个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·97 | Magus of the Abyss | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Magus of the Abyss
trans-unit.target: 深渊贤者

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·97 | Magus of the Abyss | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手选择目标由其操控且非神器的生物。消灭该生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·97 | Magus of the Abyss | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.
trans-unit.target: 他在沉降深渊的灵魂之间拾级而上，抵抗着虚空从不间断的拉扯。

trans-unit.target: 意志贤者

trans-unit.source: {2}{B}, {T}, Exile Magus of the Will: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}，{T}，放逐意志贤者：直到回合结束，你可以从你的坟墓场中使用地和施放咒语。本回合中，如果某牌将从任何区域置入你的坟墓场，则改为放逐该牌。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·98 | Magus of the Will | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "These eyes have shown me the flaws of flesh."
trans-unit.target: 「这双眼睛向我展现出肉身的瑕疵。」

trans-unit.source: Morkrut Banshee
trans-unit.target: 穆坎女妖

trans-unit.source: Morbid — When Morkrut Banshee enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～当穆坎女妖进战场时，若本回合中有生物死去，则目标生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Let go your grudges, or risk wandering the bogs forever in a murderous rage."\n—Hildin, priest of Avacyn
trans-unit.target: 「抛弃你的嫌隙，否则小心会落入抱着恨意永远在沼地徘徊的地步。」 ～艾维欣僧侣西汀

trans-unit.source: Oubliette
trans-unit.target: 密牢囚禁

trans-unit.source: When Oubliette enters the battlefield, target creature phases out until Oubliette leaves the battlefield. Tap that creature as it phases in this way. (Auras and Equipment phase out with it. While permanents are phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist.)
trans-unit.target: 当密牢囚禁进战场时，目标生物跃离，直到密牢囚禁离开战场为止。于该生物以此法跃回时，将它横置。（其上的灵气与武具也一并跃离。永久物在跃离期间视作不存在。）

trans-unit.source: Ovalchase Daredevil
trans-unit.target: 逐榄道铁胆车手

trans-unit.source: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Ovalchase Daredevil from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个神器在你的操控下进战场时，你可以将逐榄道铁胆车手从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "Let me guess. You thought I was dead."
trans-unit.target: 「我猜猜。你以为我死了。」

trans-unit.source: Painsmith
trans-unit.target: 苦痛工匠

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放神器咒语时，你可以使目标生物得+2/+0且获得死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The Moriok see the artificer as a taskmaster, forcing lazy metal into more potent shapes.
trans-unit.target: 莫锐可人将神器师看作工头，逼迫懒惰的金属成为更加强劲的形状。

trans-unit.source: Ravenous Trap
trans-unit.target: 贪婪陷阱

trans-unit.source: If an opponent had three or more cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一对手本回合中有三张或更多牌从任何区域置入其坟墓场，则你可以支付{0}，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标牌手坟墓场中的所有牌。

trans-unit.source: Salvage Titan
trans-unit.target: 废品泰坦

trans-unit.source: You may sacrifice three artifacts rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 你可以牺牲三个神器，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Exile three artifact cards from your graveyard: Return Salvage Titan from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 从你的坟墓场放逐三张神器牌：将废品泰坦从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Silumgar Scavenger
trans-unit.target: 席穆嘉族食腐鸟

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.target: 榨取（当此生物进战场时，你可以牺牲一个生物。）

trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Silumgar Scavenger. It gains haste until end of turn if it exploited that creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，在席穆嘉族食腐鸟上放置一个+1/+1指示物。如果它曾榨取该生物，则席穆嘉族食腐鸟获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Skirsdag High Priest
trans-unit.target: 史革达高阶僧侣

trans-unit.target: 丧心～{T}，横置两个由你操控且未横置的生物：派出一个5/5黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物。只能于有生物死去的回合中起动此异能。

trans-unit.source: "Thraben's pleas fall on deaf ears. Ours do not."
trans-unit.target: 「瑟班的祈祷无人听闻。我们的可不会。」

trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+2/+0且获得「当此生物死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下横置移回战场。」

trans-unit.source: "All are not equal—neither in life nor after death. Bontu's favorites will stand highest in eternity."\n—Senifet, vizier of Bontu
trans-unit.target: 「众生非平等～无论是生前还是死后。受芭图眷宠者会永远屹立巅峰。」 ～芭图维齐尔瑟尼法

trans-unit.target: 目标牌手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Any dream is a robust harvest. Still, I prefer the timeworn dreams, heavy with import, that haunt the obsessive mind."
trans-unit.target: 「任何眠梦都是醇厚的收获。不过，我还是偏好被时间消蚀、折磨着受苦心灵又充满含义的梦想。」

trans-unit.source: Toxic Deluge

trans-unit.target: 支付X点生命，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.source: "It's a difficult task to quarantine a plague that moves with the clouds."\n—Esara, healer adept
trans-unit.target: 「隔离随云漂移的瘟疫是至难之业。」 ～治疗专家易萨拉

trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+2且具有反红保护与反蓝保护。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·365 | Sword of Fire and Ice | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, Sword of Fire and Ice deals 2 damage to any target and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，炽寒剑对任意一个目标造成2点伤害，且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·365 | Sword of Fire and Ice | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Equip {2}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{2}

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·366 | Sword of Light and Shadow | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from white and from black.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+2且具有反白保护与反黑保护。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·366 | Sword of Light and Shadow | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you gain 3 life and you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你获得3点生命，且你可以将至多一张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: Equip {2}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{2}

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·367 | Sword of War and Peace | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from white.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+2且具有反红保护与反白保护。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·367 | Sword of War and Peace | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, Sword of War and Peace deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in their hand and you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，战宁剑对该牌手造成等同于其手牌数量的伤害，且你每有一张手牌便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.target: 佩带{2}

trans-unit.source: Wurmcoil Engine
trans-unit.target: 亚龙卷引擎

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch, lifelink
trans-unit.target: 死触，系命

trans-unit.source: When Wurmcoil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.
trans-unit.target: 当亚龙卷引擎死去时，派出一个3/3无色，具死触异能的亚龙衍生神器生物，和一个3/3无色，具系命异能的亚龙衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Academy Ruins
trans-unit.target: 大学院废墟

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.
{1}{U}, {T}: Put target artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}，{T}：将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: The Tolarian Academy was home to some of the greatest discoveries in Dominaria's history—as well as its greatest tragedies.
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚大学院～多明纳里亚历史上数一数二的重大发现诞生于斯，此处前所未见的惨痛灾难也发生于斯。

trans-unit.source: Urza's Mine
trans-unit.target: 克撒的矿脉

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。如果你操控「克撒的／动力炉」和「克撒的／塔」，则改为加{C}{C}。

trans-unit.source: In his hunger for power and knowledge, Urza dug deep into Dominaria's ancient past.
trans-unit.target: 克撒渴求力量与知识，深掘多明纳里亚古老的过往。

trans-unit.source: Urza's Power Plant
trans-unit.target: 克撒的动力炉

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。如果你操控「克撒的／矿脉」和「克撒的／塔」，则改为加{C}{C}。

trans-unit.source: Urza threw himself into his research, pushing the boundaries of both possibility and morality.
trans-unit.target: 克撒全力投入其研究，一再突破可能性与道德的边界。

trans-unit.source: Urza's Tower
trans-unit.target: 克撒的塔

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。如果你操控「克撒的／矿脉」和「克撒的／动力炉」，则改为加{C}{C}{C}。

trans-unit.source: Urza studied the creations of the Thran not simply to learn from them, but to surpass them.
trans-unit.target: 克撒钻研索蓝造物，不仅从中学习，更欲凌驾其上。

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·384 | Chord of Calling | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
trans-unit.target: 召集（此咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放此咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: 2XM·384 | Chord of Calling | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于X的生物牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。
